title: They Got Drake we got Charlamagne
itunes:title: They Got Drake we got Charlamagne
description:
Tuesday 8/21- Today on the show we had Natasha Alford stop by where she spoke about Omarosa, her role at ‘The Grio’ & having a seat at the table and more. Also, we had listeners call up to shoot their shot at their crush, and this time one of the listeners were trying to rekindle the flame with his baby mama. Moreover, Charlamagne gave Madonna "Donkey of the Day" after her tribute to Aretha Franklin, because it seemed more like a tribute to herself. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 8/21- Today on the show we had Natasha Alford stop by where she spoke about Omarosa, her role at ‘The Grio’ & having a seat at the table and more. Also, we had listeners call up to shoot their shot at their crush, and this time one of the listeners were trying to rekindle the flame with his baby mama. Moreover, Charlamagne gave Madonna "Donkey of the Day" after her tribute to Aretha Franklin, because it seemed more like a tribute to herself. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
